body: I had license and it expired on march 16, 2015. I applied again. Do I need to take class and pass exam again? Also how long is the wait time? Please help. Thanks

children.body:
Please reach out to the Taxi and Limousine Commission (TLC) directly.  You can find contact information at the following link.

http://www.nyc.gov/html/tlc/html/contact/contact.shtml

view.name: Medallion Drivers - Active
view.description: This list contains the most recently published active  medallion drivers list. This is a list of licensees who are currently authorized to operate NYC TLC licensed Taxicabs. The old data set is no longer being updated but can be accessed from the link given below to access data from 03/07/2013 through 01/04/2014 https://data.cityofnewyork.us/Transportation/Medallion-Drivers-Active/n776-dsqy. A new Change Log containing changes in status from 10/28/2013 onwards can be found at https://data.cityofnewyork.us/Transportation/TLC-MEDALLION-ACTIVE-Historical-Data/sjfe-fppp. This list is accurate to the date and time represented in the Last Date Updated and Last Time Updated fields.

body: I left my red electric guitar in the back of a cab yesterday morning 230 am east 3rd and first ave. THe cab didn't want to take my dog so I got out but left my guitar. HELP! 200 reward. 917-446-1860

children.body:
Please reach out to the Taxi and Limousine Commission (TLC) directly. You can find contact information at the following link. http://www.nyc.gov/html/tlc/html/contact/contact.shtml

You can also submit a lost and found inquiry at the following link.

http://www.nyc.gov/html/tlc/html/passenger/lost.shtml
